column2: "...If you want to bother someone, try the guy next to me."
"...Hm. You remind me of someone I know. Similar eyes..."
"On their first day, they bailed this Ash kid out of a real jam... Heheheh...."
"Their soul promises to be a rare delicacy. I hope they don't die before it's fully matured..."
"I went to Ragol to track down a man... My \"prey\". He went there on Pioneer I, so I followed him on Pioneer II."

"But he went and lost his life before I even arrived...
And my purpose died with him."

"There's nothing left there for me...
Or so I thought. Until they arrived. And now you. Heheheh... Yes, I think I'll find my satisfaction after all..."
"...What's up? You want to learn how to fight?"
"Alright... Then I'll teach you the basics. This won't take long. Listen up."

"Heavy attacks deal more damage, but they're easy to dodge. Wait...
Your attacks always hit?!"

"Heheheh, how foolish...
Are you seriously trying to tell me that attacks never miss in this world...?"

"Ever thought about going to Ragol? Your soul and theirs together...
That would be a feast. ...Heheheh."
"...You have to protect this place? Fine, do as you like. That dedication will only make your soul grow all the more delicious."

"One day, I'll devour that soul of yours. Make sure you live to see that day.
...Promise me you will."
"I am the Black Hound. I always catch my prey. Gaha... Ahahahaha!"
